attributes.action: Add countries on red list on scientific basis not political Basis.
attributes.additional_details: Putt countries in red list on scientific basis not political basis
attributes.background:
In pakistan  cases are still less as compared to EU and India. 
Decision should  be made on scientific grounds not on political  grounds .This situation has created a fuss and chaos and airlines are taking this as financial  opportunity. 
UK should remove Pakistan and Bangladesh from Red list
